name: Force Finger - 3D Touch Game
description:
REQUIRED 3D TOUCH ! ! !

Play this game to kill the waiting time or just have fun with the 3D Touch. Playing the game, train the tenderness and strength of your fingers. Feel the depth of the screen.

Purpose of the game:
1) click on the screen using different pressing force
2) achieve a predetermined pressing force
3) hold your finger with the prescribed force for a certain time

In the game settings, you can set the time delay of the finger in a given force and the range of error. Thus set up the difficulty for yourself.

New mode - PRO. You cannot see the your force when you touch screen.
